title: That’s Just Like, Your Opinion, Man
description: Kate, Melissa, and Leah preview the whopper first week of the November sitting. They are joined by Joseph Blocher, Professor of Law at Duke Law, to discuss NYSRPA v. Bruen.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
